Description: Responsibilities- To manage the shift and all direct staff. To ensure the smooth running of the refueling process. To ensure that all refueling and defueling are done to the specified specifications and Procedures. Conduct all refueling operations to ensure delivery of correct quantity of fuel per aircraft in accordance with safe refueling practices and set standards and obtain signed Fuel Delivery Note or Cash Payment required as per set agreement Ensure recording of all product movements during shift on product balance sheet recording amounts delivered from each Refueller / Dispenser to each aircraft.Skills
Skills: At least 8 years’ experience as SR. Refueling Operator or 5 years supervisory level in oil and Gas sector.
Bachelor’s degree in Engineering or equivalent
